detail_desc: Narrow metal rings in various designs decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the tummy and bum. Cups with removable inserts, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative gathers in the sides.
Glasses chains, one in metal chain and one with plastic beads. Length approx. 80 cm.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Alice band in padded velour with plastic beads on top.
Skirt in soft velour with an elasticated waist and flare to the hem.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine, fluffy knit with a button at the neck.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short dress in jersey with a wrapover front that has ties at one side, short sleeves and a flounce-trimmed hem.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless nursing dress in chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.

Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable hood in a double layer of sweatshirt fabric. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a zip down the front, zipped front pockets, and quilted sections on the shoulders and sleeves. Lined.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, long, trumpet sleeves and a flare to the hem.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Unicorn fancy dress costume. Sleeveless top section in jersey with a brushed finish. Lightly padded bottom section with a head, legs and shimmering hooves. Padded, shimmering wings and a faux fur mane and tail.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Short vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw, roll-edge hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Dress in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, long raglan sleeves and a drawstring at the waist. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Oversized top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loafers with leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a lace trim, low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and lightly padded cups with removable inserts.
Jacket in washed, supersoft denim with embroidered appliqués, a collar and press-studs down the front. Fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Unlined.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a motif on the front and long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Semi shiny nylon stockings with a wide, reinforced trim at the top. Use with a suspender belt. 20 denier.
Fine-knit cardigan in a merino wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey. Deep V-neck front and back with a small lace trim, and a small lace trim around the armholes.
Straight-style, knee-length dress in a soft chunky knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy cotton jersey, one pair with an all-over print. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Sleeveless blouse in crinkled viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills at the sides. Lace-trimmed gathered seam at the top and an asymmetric hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Short nursing dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, short flounced sleeves and a seam at the waist. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves, buttons down the front and two slits at the front hem.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide shoulder straps and a partially covered back section.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.

Jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with flutter sleeves and a round neckline with covered elastication. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, tasselled bow at the front, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Dresses in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Padded Alice band in soft velvet made from recycled polyester decorated with recycled glass stones and artificial pearls.

Long-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with wide, flared hems.
Long-sleeved, cotton piqué polo shirt with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Boxy-style cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets, and short slits in the sides.
